document.full_text: the race to pick a new leader for the imf formally launched on monday as mexico sought support for its central bank governor and brazil said more time was needed to make a choice.
document.title: mexico pushes carstens for imf; brazil reacts coolly
lines_and_colors: the race to pick a new leader for the imf formally launched on monday as mexico sought support for its central bank governor and brazil said more time was needed to make a choice.
